newsitem.title: BURMA: Burma makes record amphetamine seizure.
newsitem.headline: Burma makes record amphetamine seizure.

text.p: Burma's anti-drug squad seized 1.65 tons of amphetamine base near the Burma-China border in its biggest such haul, official media reported on Tuesday.
State-run media said the anti-drug squad in Muse, about 960 km (600 miles) north of Rangoon, acted on a tipoff and raided a house on October 16.
Police found powdered amphetamine base in boxes and bags. At least one person was arrested.
